doc.field: PAKISTAN CONSUMER PRICE INDEX FALLS IN JANUARY

Pakistan's consumer price index (base 1975/76) fell to 231.93 in January 1987 from 233.26 in December 1986, and compared with 223.66 a year ago, the federal Bureau of Statistics said. The wholesale price index (same base) rose to 229.83 in January from 229.06 in December and compared with 217.97 in January 1986. REUTER
